_comment: these will be a list of events at April 4, 2020 General Conference

messages: Life's trials extend beyond the pandemic
We need to fill our spiritual storehouses as much as our physical ones
Listen to messages that are for you
Lucy Smith and Joseph Smith Sr. had been through a tremendous emotional struggle when they had to start over
Joseph Smith's soul was filled with love for days after the first vision
The atonement allows things to be fixed and repaired that you cannot repair
For those that sin against the light, repentance can redeem them
Although we can't fix all of the effects of our mistakes, we can do all we can to repair them
Is it hard to be a prophet, the prophet was asked.  The Lord loves effort.  Effort brings rewards
We are always progressing as long as we strive to follow the Lord
We can turn to the scriptures to get wisdom to act
Through convenants, we have access to the power of the priesthood
The greatest champion of women is Jesus Christ
Quoting Joseph: I don't blame anyone for not believing my history, If I hadn't experienced myself, I wouldn't believe it either
Sacred experiences can be like a stone, lighting our paths during dark times

calling: First Counselor, Young Men General Presidency
messages: The Lord gives us the tools that we need to succeed in our day
Helping understanding their identities is one for greatest gifts we can give
Remember that gatherings allow us to share love
The gospel can't be forced into our hearts
The youth will amaze you if you get out the way and allow them to choose to sacrifice for the cause of Christ
We as a people will become more united among increasing conflict
The enemy of the restoration will try to stop us from praying
We should look at translation more like revelation than modern translation
Note that Lehi invited his children to come to the tree of life, he stayed where he was at
The Lord's joy and peace is added to us in extra measure when we ome to jim
Prophets have shown how our hearts can be changed through conversion
When was the last time you felt the sweetness of the Savior's atonement?
Prophets consistently remind us to remember the goodness of God
We are like Tom who received a hearth transplant and became solemn.  We have received the atonement
Reflecting on God's goodness and mercy helps us be more spiritually receptive
When we remember what God and Jesus have done for us, we won't take them for granted
Without Jesus, we are doomed
God is deeply disappointed when we don't remember his goodness
We will be transformed and become more like Jesus by studying the scriptures
Strengthen our foundations, like the Salt Lake Temple is having done to it
As much darkness as I have seen, I have seen more light
All of us are like a person with a violin, we start simple
You can ask for blessings from your family
Our service places us in the same circle as Joseph Smith, John the Baptist, etc.
Satan tries to keep us in a state of seeking carnal pleasures
Satan tries to demean women's contributions
Working together leads to better outcomes
Remembering this conference is up to us, even if it is memorable by nature
Have faith that the Lord is leading this restoration and this church
Priesthood is not the men who hold it
Fathers don't need keys to perform family functions
When a mother is the family leader, she presides, she brings power of priesthood into the home, she exercises power of priesthood by virtue of her position in the family
Look to the fruits of the gospel
The good the church does to reduce human suffering is tremendous
Let us have a worldwide fast on good Friday, April 10th, that the pandemic may be controlled
Isaiah's prophecy is being fulfilled that the world is drawn to Salt Lake and the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter day Saints and its people
Told that Elder Perry needed to see the path with they light she carried
What was once only hoped for, has now become history
We have 168 operating temples
The endowment session is available in 88 languages
Upheaval makes Christ light shine brighter
Ask Lord to open the Heavens
Increase your participation in Family History Work while temple is closed
It has never been more imperative to know how the spirit speaks to you than now
Because of the atonement, mortal afflictions are only temporary
In advance of final judgement, even those that have rejected the gospel will have a chance to accept it
God has provided a destiny of glory for all of his children (except sons of perdition)
We who know God's plan have a responsibility to teach it to others
Regardless of your situation, the church will weclome you back
Personal revelation from the Holy Ghost has been given to millions who have received a testimony of the church
Significant spiritual guidance comes when we are trying to help others
There is only one refuge, the Lord Jesus Christ and his atonement
To one without faith, no explanation is possible
How can my children live in the finest homes?
The finest homes have to do with the people who live there
The finest homes make time to study the scriptures every day
Families succeed through righteous living

person: D. Todd Christofferson J. Whitney Clayton

messages: Jesus brought hope to the hopeless
Church is structured to help us develop Christlike characterstics
We learn the important lessons of life through experience, and that wickedness never was happiness
